title: UNSPECIFIED ERROR OCCURED. PLEASE CHECK THE LOGS FOR MORE INFORMATION
body: I have tried everything that the guide said to do and nothing is working... I am really considering not playing the game any more because this is VERRRY frustrating. But if someone could help me I would appreciate it. Thank You.

replies.body: I've commonly seen the unspecific error happen while patching.  If this is the case for you, it could mean that a permissions issue is blocking the patcher from scanning your game files.  We have a [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)article available to help troubleshoot this.  Please let us know if you have any questions.

Not gonna lie I just tried all of them... I am getting very frustrated, and I did all of the solutions to the discussion on this page, http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/A6GAZtY3-having-issues-patching-613-click-here .
Which guide? Need to know what exactly you already tried and when this issue is occurring to advise on further troubleshooting steps.
